I2C0¶

Register Listing for I2C0¶

Register

Address

I2C0_W

0xf0001000

I2C0_R

0xf0001004

I2C0_W¶

Address: 0xf0001000 + 0x0 = 0xf0001000

Field

Name

Description

[0]

SCL

Drives the state of the SCL pad.

[1]

OE

Output Enable - if 0, both the SCL and SDA output drivers are disconnected.

[2]

SDA

Drives the state of the SDA pad.

I2C0_R¶

Address: 0xf0001000 + 0x4 = 0xf0001004

Field

Name

Description

[0]

SDA

Contains the current state of the SDA pad.
